html.p: The new bucket status page makes it easier to monitor large scale clusters. It provides an in-depth view of all cluster related recovery operations.

If the cluster needs any fix-ups, then the new bucket status page provides an accurate view of all the fix-ups activities. It shows the buckets that are fixed to meet replication policies vs search policies. The status page can be viewed at an aggregate level for all indexes or for specific index for detailed analysis. The page also shows any excess buckets, if present, in the cluster. The excess buckets can be removed through the bucket status page itself.
